question: Tiffany was collecting cans for recycling. On monday she had 10 bags of cans. She found 3 bags of cans on the next day and 7 bags of cans the day after that. How many bags did she have altogether?
response:
On Monday, Tiffany had 10 bags of cans. On Tuesday, she found 3 bags of cans, so she now has 10 + 3 = 13 bags of cans. On Wednesday, she found 7 bags of cans, so she now has 13 + 7 = 20 bags of cans altogether.
The answer is 20.
